botan.tls.messages

TLS Messages

interface HandshakeMessage;
TLS Handshake Message Base Class

class HelloVerifyRequest: botan.tls.messages.HandshakeMessage;
DTLS Hello Verify Request

class ClientHello: botan.tls.messages.HandshakeMessage;
TLSClient Hello Message

class ServerHello: botan.tls.messages.HandshakeMessage;
TLSServer Hello Message

class ClientKeyExchange: botan.tls.messages.HandshakeMessage;
TLSClient Key Exchange Message

class Certificate: botan.tls.messages.HandshakeMessage;
Certificate Message

this()(HandshakeIO io, ref HandshakeHash hash, auto ref Array!X509Certificate cert_list);
Create a new Certificate message

this()(HandshakeIO io, ref HandshakeHash hash, auto ref Vector!X509Certificate cert_list);
Create a new Certificate message

this()(auto ref const Vector!ubyte buf);
Deserialize a Certificate message

protected const Vector!ubyte serialize();
Serialize a Certificate message

class CertificateReq: botan.tls.messages.HandshakeMessage;
Certificate Request Message

this(HandshakeIO io, ref HandshakeHash hash, in TLSPolicy policy, Vector!X509DN ca_certs, TLSProtocolVersion _version);
Create a new Certificate Request message

this(ref const Vector!ubyte buf, TLSProtocolVersion _version);
Deserialize a Certificate Request message

protected const Vector!ubyte serialize();
Serialize a Certificate Request message

class CertificateVerify: botan.tls.messages.HandshakeMessage;
Certificate Verify Message

const bool verify(const X509Certificate cert, const HandshakeState state);
Check the signature on a certificate verify message

Params:
X509Certificate cert the purported certificate
HandshakeState state the handshake state

class Finished: botan.tls.messages.HandshakeMessage;
Finished Message

class HelloRequest: botan.tls.messages.HandshakeMessage;
Hello Request Message

class ServerKeyExchange: botan.tls.messages.HandshakeMessage;
TLSServer Key Exchange Message

const bool verify(in PublicKey server_key, const HandshakeState state);
Verify a TLSServer Key Exchange message

this(ref const Vector!ubyte buf, in string kex_algo, in string sig_algo, TLSProtocolVersion _version);
Deserialize a TLSServer Key Exchange message

this(HandshakeIO io, HandshakeState state, in TLSPolicy policy, TLSCredentialsManager creds, RandomNumberGenerator rng, in PrivateKey signing_key = null);
Create a new TLSServer Key Exchange message

protected const Vector!ubyte serialize();
Serialize a TLSServer Key Exchange message

class ServerHelloDone: botan.tls.messages.HandshakeMessage;
TLSServer Hello Done Message

class NextProtocol: botan.tls.messages.HandshakeMessage;
Next Protocol Message

class NewSessionTicket: botan.tls.messages.HandshakeMessage;
New TLSSession Ticket Message

class ChangeCipherSpec: botan.tls.messages.HandshakeMessage;
Change Cipher Spec
